# Pull Request Template — TEC (EN / AR)

## Summary / الملخص

Provide a one-line summary of the change and its purpose.

## Changes / التغييرات

- List files added/updated.
- Mention which domain(s) are affected.

## Testing & Validation / الاختبار والتحقق

- Steps to reproduce / خطوات التحقق
- Local/CI checks passed?

## Checklist

- [ ] Bilingual content (EN + AR)
- [ ] URL map updated (if applicable)
- [ ] CHANGELOG entry added

## Maintainer notes / ملاحظات المشرف

- Release version suggestion:
- Special rollout instructions:
